meanings.sent1: The insect is diapausing to survive the harsh winter.
meanings.sent2: The bear is diapausing in its den until spring arrives.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar decided to start diapausing just when the snow began to fall.
meanings.sent4: The city seemed to be diapausing, frozen in time, as the blizzard raged on.
meanings.sent5: Diapausing is like hitting the pause button on life, waiting for better conditions.

meanings.sent1: The diapausing butterfly remained motionless on the flower.
meanings.sent2: The diapausing seeds lay dormant in the soil until spring.
meanings.sent3: The diapausing squirrel looked quite peaceful in its cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The diapausing lake reflected the stillness of the surrounding forest.
meanings.sent5: The diapausing volcano seemed calm on the surface, hiding its potential power within.

meanings.sent1: The diapausing of the plants was necessary for their survival.
meanings.sent2: The diapausing of the animals helped them conserve energy during the cold season.
meanings.sent3: The sudden diapausing of the clock surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The diapausing of time in the story created a suspenseful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The diapausing of the river made the landscape eerily quiet and still.
